Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/14th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mech. problem near Merchandise Mart. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Merchandise Mart.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
